Translations.Text: There awaits them in Allah's realm the abode in the Gardens of Eden beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will have passed through nature to Eternity, Allah well pleased with them and they with Him; a reward commensurate with the equitable deeds achieved by him who has entertained the profound reverence dutiful to Allah, his Creator
When the earth, quakes, convulses and is violently shaken
And when it casts its burdensome contents of metals, corpses, bones and all that had been burned within
And mankind be struck with surprise and astonishment and emotionally vent an exclamation "What happened" they say, "to make the earth unstable and agitated
There and then will the earth tell her story, exposing everyone by his insignia, that of immorality and another of glory and another indicating reprimand
Featuring her obedience to Allah’s inspired command
There and then will people go forth assorted in groups of like attributes to be requited with what is commensurate with their deeds
Then he who has done an atom’s weight of good, will see it and profit by it
And he who has done an atom’s weight of evil, will see it and be punished for it
By the high- mettled horses when they breath hard or pant
And their hoofs emit sparks as they touch the rough terrain
En route to launch an attack on Allah's enemies at dawn
And assemble to penetrate into their midst to put them to rout with an effective thrust
That man is indeed ungrateful to Allah his Creator
And by his behavior he bears witness to this discord
How greedy he is for wealth, gains and health
Does he not know what happens when the graves eject their contents
